html:
** Italy's antitrust watchdog fines e-commerce giant Amazon.com Inc AMZN.O $1.3 bln for alleged abuse of its market dominance (Full Story)

** Shares of AMZN fall 0.3% to $3,511.2 premarket

** AMZN says it disagrees with regulator's decision and will appeal

** The fines, one of the largest imposed on U.S. tech giant in Europe comes as Big Tech has been under radar for string of scandals over privacy and misinformation, as well as complaints from some businesses that they abuse their market power

** Megacap tech stocks including AMZN, Microsoft MSFT.O, Apple Inc AAPL.O, Alphabet GOOGL.O, Tesla TSLA.O, Nvidia NVDA.O and Meta Platforms FB.O, are all down premarket, after past few sessions of gains .N

** Up to Wednesday's close, AMZN up 8.2% YTD


(Reporting by Chavi Mehta in Bengaluru)

(( Chavi.Mehta@thomsonreuters.com ;))
